Articles.Content:
Based on the [Kerbal Foundries vs. KerbinSide Air-Race Challenge](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128119-Kerbal-Foundries-vs-KerbinSide-Air-Race-Antigrav-race-near-KSC), I build a Boonta Eve Classic style Podracer. I've also put up a [challenge to build and fly your own Podracer (or this one)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129485-Boonta-Eve-Classic-A-Star-Wars-Podracer-Challenge)

Link to [the Jar-Jar mk V Podracer](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B2-h41qiJELMYnJ6dHpNUFZLNE0/view?usp=sharing) on Google Drive

[Reddit discussion](https://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/3e7jwc/this_is_why_star_wars_podracers_are_a_terrible/?ref=share&ref_source=link)

Mods required

- [KerbinSide](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82785) (download [Air-Race](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/851/Kerbin-Side%20Air-Race)) (if you want to do the race)
- [Kerbal Foundries](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84102)
- [Kerbal Attachment System](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92514-0-24-2-Kerbal-Attachment-System-%28KAS%29-0-4-8-Fixed-for-0-24-2-x86-x64-%29)
- [Quantum Struts](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93818-1-0-QuantumStrutsContinued-1-3-Magical-Struts-for-Rigidifying-Outside-the-VAB!)

Here's a video on how to launch it.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_e8YSyxGoWw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Relevant videos

My build / crash video to give you an idea what you're getting into

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9LmNnkNTzFM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-23T05:56:48Z" title="07/23/2015 05:56  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 23, 2015</time> by Soda Popinski**
